source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot from a low-angle perspective at the bottom of a staircase. The walls and ceiling are uniformly covered in small, white tiles, flanked by simple black handrails. The camera moves steadily up the stairs toward an intensely bright, white light at the top, which creates a stark and minimalist atmosphere.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot from a low-angle perspective at the bottom of a staircase. The walls and ceiling are uniformly covered in small, white tiles, flanked by simple black handrails. The camera moves steadily up the stairs toward an intensely bright, white light at the top, which creates a stark and minimalist atmosphere.

generated_critique: The provided caption accurately describes the camera's upward motion and the general setting, but it misses a key moving subject and includes subjective language. In the video, the shadow of a person is clearly visible on the right-hand tiled wall, ascending the stairs just ahead of the camera's viewpoint. The caption fails to describe the motion of this shadow, which is the primary subject action. Furthermore, the phrase "which creates a stark and minimalist atmosphere" is an interpretive and subjective statement, which the instructions advise against. The description also spends too much time on static architectural details like the tiles and handrails, which are secondary to the motion. A more effective description would focus on the actions in chronological order, first noting the shadow figure climbing the stairs and then describing the camera's movement as it follows, all while omitting the subjective analysis of the atmosphere.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: The video captures a shadow of a person ascending the staircase, visible on the right-hand tiled wall. The camera follows this shadow, moving steadily up the stairs toward a bright white light at the top. The setting includes small white tiles on the walls and ceiling, with simple black handrails on either side.
